name: bksr
description: Run and test your Buildkite pipeline steps locally, just as they'd run in CI, using the buildkite-agent itself.
author: Tim Lucas (http://toolmantim.com)

scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish && npm run pkg && open pkg/compressed && open "$(node -e 'p=require("./package.json"); console.log(`https://github.com/${p.repository}/releases/new?tag=v${p.version}`)')"
scripts.pkg: rm -rf pkg && pkg --out-path pkg . && cd pkg && mkdir -p compressed && zip -r compressed/bksr-macos.zip bksr-macos && tar -zcvf compressed/bksr-linux.tar.gz bksr-linux && zip -r compressed/bksr-win.zip bksr-win.exe && ls -l compressed
